verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

צַ֚ו <S%H6680><s%> Command אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וִֽישַׁלְּחוּ֙ <S%H7971><s%> that they put out מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <S%H4264><s%> of the camp כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every צָר֖וּעַ <S%H6879><s%> every leper וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and everyone זָ֑ב <S%H2100><s%> and every one that hath an issue וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> and everyone טָמֵ֥א <S%H2931><s%> and whosoever is defiled לָנָֽפֶשׁ׃ <S%H5315><s%> by the dead

מִזָּכָ֤ר <S%H2145><s%> Both male עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against נְקֵבָה֙ <S%H5347><s%> and female תְּשַׁלֵּ֔חוּ <S%H7971><s%> shall ye put out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מִח֥וּץ <S%H2351><s%> without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <S%H4264><s%> the camp תְּשַׁלְּח֑וּם <S%H7971><s%> shall ye put וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> they will not יְטַמְּאוּ֙ <S%H2930><s%> them that they defile אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַ֣חֲנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H4264><s%> not their camps אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whereof אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I שֹׁכֵ֥ן <S%H7931><s%> I dwell בְּתוֹכָֽם׃ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst

וַיַּֽעֲשׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> did so כֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> so בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיְשַׁלְּח֣וּ <S%H7971><s%> and put them out אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מִח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> the camp כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> thus עָשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> so did בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּר֮ <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> When a man אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or אִשָּׁ֗ה <S%H802><s%> or woman כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> When יַעֲשׂוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> shall commit מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner חַטֹּ֣את <S%H2403><s%> any sin הָֽאָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> that men לִמְעֹ֥ל <S%H4603><s%> commit מַ֖עַל <S%H4604><s%> to do a trespass בַּיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD וְאָֽשְׁמָ֖ה <S%H816><s%> be guilty הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> and that person הַהִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וְהִתְוַדּ֗וּ <S%H3034><s%> Then they shall confess אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> חַטָּאתָם֮ <S%H2403><s%> their sin אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשׂוּ֒ <S%H6213><s%> which they have done וְהֵשִׁ֤יב <S%H7725><s%> and he shall recompense אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲשָׁמוֹ֙ <S%H817><s%> his trespass בְּרֹאשׁ֔וֹ <S%H7218><s%> with the principal וַחֲמִישִׁת֖וֹ <S%H2549><s%> unto it the fifth יֹסֵ֣ף <S%H3254><s%> thereof and add עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> of וְנָתַ֕ן <S%H5414><s%> [part] thereof and give לַאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> whom אָשַׁ֥ם <S%H816><s%> [it] unto [him] against whom he hath trespassed לֽוֹ׃

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if אֵ֨ין <S%H369><s%> has לָאִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> But if the man גֹּאֵ֗ל <S%H1350><s%> have no kinsman לְהָשִׁ֤יב <S%H7725><s%> to recompense הָאָשָׁם֙ <S%H817><s%> the trespass אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> for הָאָשָׁ֛ם <S%H817><s%> unto let the trespass הַמּוּשָׁ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> be recompensed לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD לַכֹּהֵ֑ן <S%H3548><s%> [even] to the priest מִלְּבַ֗ד <S%H905><s%> alone אֵ֚יל <S%H352><s%> beside the ram הַכִּפֻּרִ֔ים <S%H3725><s%> of the atonement אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יְכַפֶּר־ <S%H3722><s%> whereby an atonement shall be made בּ֖וֹ עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> Also

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every תְּרוּמָ֞ה <S%H8641><s%> And every offering לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all קָדְשֵׁ֧י <S%H6944><s%> of all the holy things בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יַקְרִ֥יבוּ <S%H7126><s%> which they bring לַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> unto the priest ל֥וֹ יִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

וְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And every man's אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קֳדָשָׁ֖יו <S%H6944><s%> hallowed things ל֣וֹ יִהְי֑וּ <S%H1961><s%> becomes אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> shall be his whatsoever any man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> shall be his whatever יִתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth לַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest ל֥וֹ יִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> becomes פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <S%H559><s%> and say אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> about אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto them If any אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> man's כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If תִשְׂטֶ֣ה <S%H7847><s%> go aside אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <S%H802><s%> wife וּמָעֲלָ֥ה <S%H4603><s%> and commit ב֖וֹ מָֽעַל׃ <S%H4604><s%> a trespass

וְשָׁכַ֨ב <S%H7901><s%> lie אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And a man אֹתָהּ֮ <S%H854><s%> for שִׁכְבַת־ <S%H7902><s%> seed זֶרַע֒ <S%H2233><s%> child וְנֶעְלַם֙ <S%H5956><s%> and it be hid מֵעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> from the eyes אִישָׁ֔הּ <S%H376><s%> of her husband וְנִסְתְּרָ֖ה <S%H5641><s%> and be kept close וְהִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> herself נִטְמָ֑אָה <S%H2930><s%> and she be defiled וְעֵד֙ <S%H5707><s%> and [there be] no witness אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> and there בָּ֔הּ וְהִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> herself לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> has not נִתְפָּֽשָׂה׃ <S%H8610><s%> against her neither she be taken

וְעָבַ֨ר <S%H5674><s%> come עָלָ֧יו <S%H5921><s%> over רֽוּחַ־ <S%H7307><s%> And the spirit קִנְאָ֛ה <S%H7068><s%> of jealousy וְקִנֵּ֥א <S%H7065><s%> upon him and he be jealous אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <S%H802><s%> of his wife וְהִ֣וא <S%H1931><s%> she נִטְמָ֑אָה <S%H2930><s%> and she be defiled אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or עָבַ֨ר <S%H5674><s%> come עָלָ֤יו <S%H5921><s%> over רֽוּחַ־ <S%H7307><s%> or if the spirit קִנְאָה֙ <S%H7068><s%> of jealousy וְקִנֵּ֣א <S%H7065><s%> upon him and he be jealous אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <S%H802><s%> of his wife וְהִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> he לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> has not נִטְמָֽאָה׃ <S%H2930><s%> and she be not defiled

וְהֵבִ֨יא <S%H935><s%> bring הָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> Then shall the man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִשְׁתּוֹ֮ <S%H802><s%> his wife אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַכֹּהֵן֒ <S%H3548><s%> unto the priest וְהֵבִ֤יא <S%H935><s%> and he shall bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קָרְבָּנָהּ֙ <S%H7133><s%> her offering עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> for עֲשִׂירִ֥ת <S%H6224><s%> for her the tenth הָאֵיפָ֖ה <S%H374><s%> [part] of an ephah קֶ֣מַח <S%H7058><s%> meal שְׂעֹרִ֑ים <S%H8184><s%> of barley לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יִצֹ֨ק <S%H3332><s%> he shall pour עָלָ֜יו <S%H5921><s%> and שֶׁ֗מֶן <S%H8081><s%> no oil וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יִתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> upon it nor put עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> and לְבֹנָ֔ה <S%H3828><s%> frankincense כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> grain מִנְחַ֤ת <S%H4503><s%> thereon for it [is] an offering קְנָאֹת֙ <S%H7068><s%> of jealousy ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מִנְחַ֥ת <S%H4503><s%> an offering זִכָּר֖וֹן <S%H2146><s%> of memorial מַזְכֶּ֥רֶת <S%H2142><s%> to remembrance עָוֹֽן׃ <S%H5771><s%> iniquity

וְהִקְרִ֥יב <S%H7126><s%> shall bring her near אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest וְהֶֽעֱמִדָ֖הּ <S%H5975><s%> and set לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> her before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> God

וְלָקַ֧ח <S%H3947><s%> shall take הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest מַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> water קְדֹשִׁ֖ים <S%H6918><s%> holy בִּכְלִי־ <S%H3627><s%> vessel חָ֑רֶשׂ <S%H2789><s%> in an earthen וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> some הֶֽעָפָ֗ר <S%H6083><s%> and of the dust אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> after יִהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> is on בְּקַרְקַ֣ע <S%H7172><s%> that is in the floor הַמִּשְׁכָּ֔ן <S%H4908><s%> of the tabernacle יִקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> shall take הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְנָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> and put אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> [it] into the water

וְהֶעֱמִ֨יד <S%H5975><s%> shall set הַכֹּהֵ֥ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאִשָּׁה֮ <S%H802><s%> the woman לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וּפָרַע֙ <S%H6544><s%> and uncover אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> head הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> the woman's וְנָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> and put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in כַּפֶּ֗יהָ <S%H3709><s%> in her hands אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> מִנְחַ֣ת <S%H4503><s%> the offering הַזִּכָּר֔וֹן <S%H2146><s%> of memorial מִנְחַ֥ת <S%H4503><s%> offering קְנָאֹ֖ת <S%H7068><s%> which [is] the jealousy הִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> which וּבְיַ֤ד <S%H3027><s%> shall have in his hand הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> and the priest יִהְי֔וּ <S%H1961><s%> become מֵ֥י <S%H4325><s%> water הַמָּרִ֖ים <S%H4751><s%> the bitter הַמְאָֽרֲרִֽים׃ <S%H779><s%> that causeth the curse

וְהִשְׁבִּ֨יעַ <S%H7650><s%> shall charge her by an oath אֹתָ֜הּ <S%H853><s%> הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest וְאָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> and say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָֽאִשָּׁה֙ <S%H802><s%> unto the woman אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> no שָׁכַ֥ב <S%H7901><s%> have lain אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> If no man אֹתָ֔ךְ <S%H854><s%> for וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> and if לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no שָׂטִ֛ית <S%H7847><s%> with thee and if thou hast not gone aside טֻמְאָ֖ה <S%H2932><s%> to uncleanness תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under אִישֵׁ֑ךְ <S%H376><s%> [with another] instead of thy husband הִנָּקִ֕י <S%H5352><s%> be thou free מִמֵּ֛י <S%H4325><s%> water הַמָּרִ֥ים <S%H4751><s%> from this bitter הַֽמְאָרֲרִ֖ים <S%H779><s%> that causeth the curse הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> to this

וְאַ֗תְּ <S%H859><s%> you כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> if שָׂטִ֛ית <S%H7847><s%> But if thou hast gone aside תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> under אִישֵׁ֖ךְ <S%H376><s%> [to another] instead of thy husband וְכִ֣י <S%H3588><s%> and if נִטְמֵ֑את <S%H2930><s%> and if thou be defiled וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> have אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and some man בָּךְ֙ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁכָבְתּ֔וֹ <S%H7903><s%> lain מִֽבַּלְעֲדֵ֖י <S%H1107><s%> with thee beside אִישֵֽׁךְ׃ <S%H376><s%> thine husband

וְהִשְׁבִּ֨יעַ <S%H7650><s%> shall charge הַכֹּהֵ֥ן <S%H3548><s%> Then the priest אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽאִשָּׁה֮ <S%H802><s%> the woman בִּשְׁבֻעַ֣ת <S%H7621><s%> with an oath הָאָלָה֒ <S%H423><s%> of cursing וְאָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> shall say הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> and the priest לָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> unto the woman יִתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> make יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אוֹתָ֛ךְ <S%H853><s%> לְאָלָ֥ה <S%H423><s%> thee a curse וְלִשְׁבֻעָ֖ה <S%H7621><s%> and an oath בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among עַמֵּ֑ךְ <S%H5971><s%> thy people בְּתֵ֨ת <S%H5414><s%> doth make יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> when the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְרֵכֵךְ֙ <S%H3409><s%> thy thigh נֹפֶ֔לֶת <S%H5307><s%> to rot וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּטְנֵ֖ךְ <S%H990><s%> and thy belly צָבָֽה׃ <S%H6638><s%> fight swell

וּ֠בָאוּ <S%H935><s%> shall go הַמַּ֨יִם <S%H4325><s%> And this water הַמְאָרְרִ֤ים <S%H779><s%> that causeth the curse הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> and this בְּֽמֵעַ֔יִךְ <S%H4578><s%> into thy bowels לַצְבּ֥וֹת <S%H6638><s%> to swell בֶּ֖טֶן <S%H990><s%> to make [thy] belly וְלַנְפִּ֣ל <S%H5307><s%> to rot יָרֵ֑ךְ <S%H3409><s%> and [thy] thigh וְאָמְרָ֥ה <S%H559><s%> shall say הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> And the woman אָמֵ֥ן ׀ <S%H543><s%> Amen אָמֵֽן׃ <S%H543><s%> amen

וְ֠כָתַב <S%H3789><s%> shall write אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָלֹ֥ת <S%H423><s%> these curses הָאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest בַּסֵּ֑פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in a book וּמָחָ֖ה <S%H4229><s%> and he shall blot אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into מֵ֥י <S%H4325><s%> water הַמָּרִֽים׃ <S%H4751><s%> [them] out with the bitter

וְהִשְׁקָה֙ <S%H8248><s%> to drink אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣אִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> And he shall cause the woman אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֵ֥י <S%H4325><s%> water הַמָּרִ֖ים <S%H4751><s%> the bitter הַמְאָֽרֲרִ֑ים <S%H779><s%> that causeth the curse וּבָ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> shall enter בָ֛הּ הַמַּ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> and the water הַֽמְאָרֲרִ֖ים <S%H779><s%> that causeth the curse לְמָרִֽים׃ <S%H4751><s%> into her [and become] bitter

וְלָקַ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> shall take הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> Then the priest מִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> hand הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> out of the woman's אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> מִנְחַ֣ת <S%H4503><s%> offering הַקְּנָאֹ֑ת <S%H7068><s%> the jealousy וְהֵנִ֤יף <S%H5130><s%> and shall wave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּנְחָה֙ <S%H4503><s%> the offering לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְהִקְרִ֥יב <S%H7126><s%> and offer אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> it upon the altar

וְקָמַ֨ץ <S%H7061><s%> shall take an handful הַכֹּהֵ֤ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> of the grain הַמִּנְחָה֙ <S%H4503><s%> of the offering אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַזְכָּ֣רָתָ֔הּ <S%H234><s%> [even] the memorial וְהִקְטִ֖יר <S%H6999><s%> thereof and burn הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חָה <S%H4196><s%> [it] upon the altar וְאַחַ֛ר <S%H310><s%> and afterward יַשְׁקֶ֥ה <S%H8248><s%> to drink אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> shall cause the woman אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> the water

וְהִשְׁקָ֣הּ <S%H8248><s%> And when he hath made her to drink אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּ֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> the water וְהָיְתָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> shall come אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> if נִטְמְאָה֮ <S%H2930><s%> then it shall come to pass [that] if she be defiled וַתִּמְעֹ֣ל <S%H4603><s%> and have done מַ֣עַל <S%H4604><s%> trespass בְּאִישָׁהּ֒ <S%H376><s%> against her husband וּבָ֨אוּ <S%H935><s%> shall enter בָ֜הּ הַמַּ֤יִם <S%H4325><s%> that the water הַמְאָֽרֲרִים֙ <S%H779><s%> that causeth the curse לְמָרִ֔ים <S%H4751><s%> into her [and become] bitter וְצָבְתָ֣ה <S%H6638><s%> shall swell בִטְנָ֔הּ <S%H990><s%> and her belly וְנָפְלָ֖ה <S%H5307><s%> shall rot יְרֵכָ֑הּ <S%H3409><s%> and her thigh וְהָיְתָ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> will become הָאִשָּׁ֛ה <S%H802><s%> and the woman לְאָלָ֖ה <S%H423><s%> shall be a curse בְּקֶ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> among עַמָּֽהּ׃ <S%H5971><s%> her people

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> has not נִטְמְאָה֙ <S%H2930><s%> be not defiled הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> And if the woman וּטְהֹרָ֖ה <S%H2889><s%> but be clean הִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> she וְנִקְּתָ֖ה <S%H5352><s%> then she shall be free וְנִזְרְעָ֥ה <S%H2232><s%> and shall conceive זָֽרַע׃ <S%H2233><s%> seed

זֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> likewise תּוֹרַ֖ת <S%H8451><s%> This [is] the law הַקְּנָאֹ֑ת <S%H7068><s%> of jealousies אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> when תִּשְׂטֶ֥ה <S%H7847><s%> goeth aside אִשָּׁ֛ה <S%H802><s%> when a wife תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> under אִישָׁ֖הּ <S%H376><s%> [to another] instead of her husband וְנִטְמָֽאָה׃ <S%H2930><s%> and is defiled

א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> upon him אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> when תַּעֲבֹ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> cometh עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> over ר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Or when the spirit קִנְאָ֖ה <S%H7068><s%> of jealousy וְקִנֵּ֣א <S%H7065><s%> and he be jealous אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <S%H802><s%> over his wife וְהֶעֱמִ֤יד <S%H5975><s%> and shall set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽאִשָּׁה֙ <S%H802><s%> the woman לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְעָ֤שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> shall execute לָהּ֙ הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> and the priest אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַתּוֹרָ֖ה <S%H8451><s%> upon her all this law הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise

וְנִקָּ֥ה <S%H5352><s%> be guiltless הָאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> Then shall the man מֵעָוֹ֑ן <S%H5771><s%> from iniquity וְהָאִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> woman הַהִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> and this תִּשָּׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> shall bear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲוֹנָֽהּ׃ <S%H5771><s%> her iniquity פ
